00253 // operations
00254 
00255 inline CVector2d CAffine2d::GetApply(const CVector2d& position) const
00256 {
00257        CVector2d result;
00258        m_deformMatrix.GetMultiplied(position, result);
00259 
00260        return result + m_translation;
00261 }
00262 
00263 
00264 inline void CAffine2d::GetApply(const CVector2d& position, CVector2d& result) const
00265 {
00266        m_deformMatrix.GetMultiplied(position, result);
00267        result += m_translation;
00268 }
00269 
00270 
00271 inline CVector2d CAffine2d::GetApplyToDelta(const CVector2d& delta) const
00272 {
00273        CVector2d retVal;
00274 
00275        m_deformMatrix.GetMultiplied(delta, retVal);
00276 
00277        return retVal;
00278 }

00287 inline CAffine2d CAffine2d::GetTranslated(const CVector2d& vector) const
00288 {
00289        return CAffine2d(m_deformMatrix, m_translation + vector);
00290 }
00291 
00292 
00293 inline void CAffine2d::GetTranslated(const CVector2d& vector, CAffine2d& result) const
00294 {
00295        result.GetDeformMatrixRef() = m_deformMatrix;
00296        result.GetTranslationRef() = m_translation + vector;
00297 }

00328 inline bool CAffine2d::operator==(const CAffine2d& transform) const
00329 {
00330        return (m_translation == transform.m_translation) && (m_deformMatrix == transform.m_deformMatrix);
00331 }
00332 
00333 
00334 inline bool CAffine2d::operator!=(const CAffine2d& transform) const
00335 {
00336        return (m_translation != transform.m_translation) || (m_deformMatrix != transform.m_deformMatrix);
00337 }
